channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: My First Post
item.description:
Hi, I am Khushi Sharma.

I am currently pursuing a degree in Information Science. This blog is part of my course, “Becoming a Reflective Informative Scientist “, where we are encouraged not just to learn concepts, but to think, question and reflect on how we learn. I am still exploring this field and trying to understand things step by step. Through this blog, I will share my learning experience, the challenges I face and how I grow during this course.
